CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISNULL(End_Date__c)), (TEXT(FLOOR((End_Date__c-Start_Date__c)/365.2425)) & " year(s)"&", " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((End_Date__c-Start_Date__c),365.2425)/30)) & " month(s)"&", "& TEXT(Floor(MOD(Floor(MOD((End_Date__c-Start_Date__c),365.2425)),30))) & " day(s)"&"; "&TEXT(End_Date__c-Start_Date__c)&" days"),
TEXT(FLOOR((TODAY()-Start_Date__c)/365.2425)) & " year(s)"&", " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((TODAY()-Start_Date__c),365.2425)/30)) & " month(s)"&", "& TEXT(Floor(MOD(Floor(MOD((TODAY()-Start_Date__c),365.2425)),30))) & " day(s)"&"; "&TEXT(TODAY()-Start_Date__c)&" days" )
CustomField.label: Assigned Deputy Tenure
